main event: Multiple sightings of a bright, round, white light moving in a straight line, then suddenly disappearing and reappearing in the Seminole, Texas area on December 8, 1960.
interesting points: The object was observed visually and on radar, moving at speeds between 150-300 mph.
The object was observed to blink on and off several times and then disappear.
The object caused interference with radio and television signals in the area.
Civilians and military personnel in the area reported seeing the object, but it could not be identified.
An investigation was conducted but could not determine the nature of the object.
